name: Dice Shooter (OptimalOscar)
description:
Shoot at the bat-like things. When you kill one, it will drop to the ground and roll a random number. Your weapon will change to the number shown on the dice. 

The bigger the number on the dice bat when it spawns, the more health it will have.

WASD to move and click to shoot. Aim with your mouse.

NOTE: This game might have some bugs.
